price: 57. Markaan uga yeellayna ina Maryam (Ciise) tusaale, mise qolodaada (mushrikiinta ah) way ka jeesadeen (tusaalahaa)14.
arabic: ۞ وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوۡمُكَ مِنۡهُ يَصِدُّونَ
footnotes: 14. Inuu ka mid yahay uunka Ilaahay, kuwaasoo lala barbar caabudo Allaah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walammā ḍuriba ub'nu maryama mathalan idhā qawmuka min'hu yaṣiddūna
